title: Don’t
description: Bad things happen when you do things. So don’t.
altHero: two men and a woman looking mystified through an ornate gate
alt1: light shines through an open doorway into a dusty, abandoned room
alt2: a man reaches out and two women look scared
alt3: a boy with white eyes holds a knife above his head
alt4: a creepy man holds the face of a frightened woman
